title: John Walker Lindh Sentenced - 2002 | Today In History | 4 Oct 17
description:
On October 4, 2002, John Walker Lindh, the so-called "American Taliban," was sentenced to 20 years in prison by a federal judge in Alexandria, Va.



You can license this story through AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/metadata/youtube/7bda56ab9ad61785b059cce666421f70
